The station opened on October 14, 1966, as part of the original network of the metro. It was briefly the terminus of the orange line until [[Square-Victoria (Montreal Metro)|Square-Victoria]] station opened four months later, quickly followed by [[Bonaventure (Montreal Metro)|Bonaventure]] station, the planned terminus. ==Overview== The metro station, designed by J.
